participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: friendly and sociable, enjoys interactions but also values personal space
participant_1.background: i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm married to a doctor. i am a professional tennis player. my family is continuously growing. i live in a three storey house.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: reflective and independent, prefers a quiet lifestyle but values social interactions at the gym
participant_2.background: i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i like to spend my money on cars. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home.

content.text:
Hello ðŸ‘‹ 
Tell me about yourself!
Hi! Well, not much to tell. I work from home, i like cars, i like going to the gym. And what about you?
I am a bit of a loner, i do not have a car.
I am a loner too... at least i can work from home. What is your job?
I am a stay at home mom.
Well, nice, you do not need to leave home too if you do not want
I will try. I am a bit older and i like to go to the gym.
Actually i go there to talk to people, lol. Sometimes i am just too tired to stay home.
I do not blame you. I am a stay at home mom.
He is 15 and i love my job
It is very important to have.
I am a huge fan of all types of things except country
